NIOP-E, Sta. 618: Seychelles, Mahé, NE coast, North East Point; 04°35'S 55°28'E; depth 14 m; reef flat, exposed reef slope with sparse coral cover merging into sandy bottom; scuba diving; on white gorgonian;14.xii.1992; coll. by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 606: Seychelles, Mahé, W coast, Port Launay National Park; 04°38'S 55°23'E; shallow subtidal, reefslope; snorkeling; depth 5 m: on Stichodactyla mertensii; 9.xii.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 717: Seychelles, Bird Island, off E coast; 3°43'S 55°13'E; edge of bank, depth ca. 10 m; scuba-diving; in brown sponge Spirastrella inconstans (Det. R. van Soest); 20/21.XII.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
NIOP-E, Sta. 797: Seychelles, Platte Island atoll; 05°49'S 55°21'E; lagoon of inner atoll, depth 12 m; scuba diving; 7.i.93; in Tridacna ? maxima; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
NIOP-E, Sta. 792: Seychelles, St François atoll, W rim; 7°05'S 52°44'E; outer slope down to 27 m depth; scuba-diving; 5/6.i.1993; in Tridacna ? maxima; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 723: Seychelles, Bird Island, off N coast; 3°42'S 55°12'E; coral reef, near drop-off, depth25 m; scuba-diving; 22.XII.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen; in small Pteria aegyptiaca (Dillwyn, 1817) oysters (collected) on Antepetaria.
